Package main

Class Farmer

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Farmer
  • public class Farmer
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles daily actions made to the farm by the player. Also stores name and age of player.
    Author:
    Nick

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Farmer​(Farm myFarm)
      Initialises Farmer using an existing farm.
      Farmer​(Farm myFarm, java.lang.String myName, int myAge)
      Initialises Farmer using an existing farm, in addition to a name and an age for the farmer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Farmer

        public Farmer​(Farm myFarm)
        Initialises Farmer using an existing farm.
        Parameters:
        myFarm - - the farm to use

      • Farmer

        public Farmer​(Farm myFarm,
              java.lang.String myName,
              int myAge)
        Initialises Farmer using an existing farm, in addition to a name and an age for the farmer. This constructor assumes that all validation (checking if name is valid, for instance) has already been done.
        Parameters:
        myFarm - - the farm to use
        myName - - name of farmer
        myAge - - age of farmer

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String newName)
        Set name of farmer to newName. Used in command-line interface only.
        Parameters:
        newName - - name to set the farmer name to

      • setAge

        public void setAge​(int newAge)

      • isValidName

        public boolean isValidName​(java.lang.String name)
        Will be used by Farmer.setDetails() to check whether a name is valid. (This is not implemented yet.) Note that for the GUI, the validation will be done in the GUI, as opposed to through the isValidName method.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name to check
        Returns:
        whether name is a valid name

      • setDetails

        public void setDetails​(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Prompt user for their name and age. Used by the command-line interface.

      • tendToCrops

        public void tendToCrops​(java.lang.String action,
                        Crop type,
                        Item choice)
        all benefits for each item hard coded. Item affects all items of specific type. If watering plants is selected, then choice will be null Tomaccoland crops should grow one day faster per action MoomooFarm crops should grow 2 days faster per action if cow is in play
